transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Yes.

Executive: Shubhnath paper se baat kar rahe hain?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Ji, ma'am aapka call aaya tha, main Indiamart.com se baat kar raha tha, senior manager Anurag Sharma recorded line.

Customer: Recording hai sir.

Executive: Aapne call kiya tha kisi regarding mein, minimum charges ke regarding bataiye kya kya issue aa raha tha sir?

Customer: Kuch nahi sir, humne ek payment kiya tha 30,000 ka, to uske against mujhe bill nahi mila hai sir.

Executive: Aapne payment kiya tha 30,000 ka, uska bill nahi aapko mila hai. Ek second.

Executive: Ye Indiamart sahi hai na, right ma'am?

Customer: Ji, ji, ji sir.

Executive: Ek second. Aap abhi kaise use karte ho ma'am, phone pe use karte ho isko ya fir laptop se?

Customer: Sir mujhe uske bare mein kuch idea nahi hai.

Executive: Nahi app kaise use karte ho aap? Indiamart use to aap karte ho?

Customer: Main nahi use karti hu, main account team se baat kar rahi hu.

Executive: Koi issue nahi hai. Aap mujhe ek bar wo bataiye apna whatsapp number bataiye ek bar. Aapka whatsapp number kya hai ma'am? Haan ji.

Customer: Mera number hai 788

Executive: 788

Customer: 00

Executive: 00

Customer: 5520

Executive: Haan, ek bar check kijiyega ma'am.

Customer: Ek minute.

Executive: Open kijiyega.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Five deliver hue hain aapke pass?

Customer: Haan sir.

Executive: Haan ji.

Executive: To ye raha ma'am aapka invoice. Jo aapne amount pay kiya tha 3340 rupees, maine aapko bhej diya.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Theek hai ma'am? Ye 2023 ka renewal hai aapka. Theek hai? Abhi yaha par aapne call kiya tha na customer care pe to uska ma'am ticket open ho gaya tha. To abhi main isko close kar raha hu, aapke pass ek feedback aayega mail par ya whatsapp par, to usko yes pe reply, satisfy pe reply kar dijiyega please.

Customer: Theek hai, theek hai chalega.

Executive: Iske alawa iske alawa to koi concern nahi hai na ma'am?

Customer: Nahi sir, par ye konse mail ID pe aayega sir? Mail pe bhi rahega.

Executive: Haan ye aapko mail ma'am bata raha hu abhi aapko. Haan. Ek second dijiyega. Ye aayega aise aapki starting hai mail ID @spllp.in.

Customer: @spllp.in.

Executive: Sales hai shayad sales@spllp.in. Kind of ye hai mail.

Customer: Sir ye ID malum nahi hai kiske pass use ho raha hai. Ab yahi number agar whatsapp pe.

Executive: Puri mail ID ek second main bata deta hu aapko, ek second line pe rahiyega.

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hello? Ji ji haan sir.

Executive: Accha accha mujhe laga mujhse baat kar rahe hain sir. Ek ek ma'am do mail ID hai isme na ye hamare pass wo nahi rehta agar main ek second proposal aapko bhej ke dekh leta hu. Confirm ho jayega konsa mail ID hai. Aap kya use karte hain mail ID abhi?

Customer: Account@spllp.in.

Executive: @. To ye jo jayega main bata raha hu aapko.

Executive: Hum isme aapka jo ye hai catalog isme registration aapki jo calls aa rahi hai na. Aap ek bar isko bhi thoda sa priority pe dekhiyega ye na calls miss ho rahe hain to jo bhi agar aapki company mein use karte hain na isko. To aap unko boliyega ki jo bhi calls aa rahe hain na aap logo ke pass wo theek se answer kare. Kyunki last 30 days mein aapke pass saat call aaye hain jisme se ek hi call aapne uthaya hai.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Theek hai na jo matlab jo handle kar rahe hain ya ek bar sir se bhi baat kar lijiyega aap ki sir jo bhi services handle kar rahe hain unko thoda sa ek bar agar kuch bhi discussion ki zarurat hai to hum discussion bhi kar lenge. Theek hai? Matlab hum ek call arrange kar lenge call aap mera number unke sath share kar dijiyega kyunki kafi call miss ho rahi hai.

Executive: To ye invoice to maine aapko whatsapp pe bhej diya hai ma'am feedback jo aayega wo registered mail pe hi aayega ye sales sales@ pe hi jayega aapka. Theek hai? To aap ek jo handle jo dekh wo check karega. Aap ek bar haan ek bar aap usme kya naam hai sir ka mail ID ya check karke waha se aap usse reply kar dijiyega. Theek hai? Koi bhi concern hota hai aapko koi bhi concern hota hai to aap mujhe reach out kar sakte hain. Theek hai? Ye wala invoice maine aapko ye wala invoice aapko share kar diya. Theek hai na? Okay.

Customer: Okay sir. Thank you. Thank you. Agar mujhe aage kuch query rahega to aapka number save karke rakhu ya fir customer care se baat karna padega?

Executive: Mera number save kar lo aap directly mujhe call kar dena.

Customer: Theek hai chalega. Aapka naam sir? Aapka naam?

Executive: Anurag Sharma ma'am. Anurag Sharma naam hai.

Customer: Okay okay. Thank you sir. Thank you.

Executive: Thank you ma'am have a good day. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive the invoice.

- Wants to know the correct email ID for feedback.

- Missed calls.



Resolution:

- Invoice sent to the customer via WhatsApp.

- Provided the correct email ID.

- Asked to prioritize answering calls.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will reply to the feedback form.

- Customer will discuss call handling with team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- invoice, email id, missed calls, feedback
